description: Number of linear geometries on n points with <=3 points per line.
references: D. G. Glynn, Rings of geometries II, J. Combin. Theory, A 49 (1988), 26-66.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Simon Plouffe_
